title: dhIm tAm tAm dhiri (t)
sahitya:
dhIm tAm tAm dhirana nAdhira nAdhira


anupallavi

  tOm tatAra dhir dhir tAni tanana tanatAm tanatAm tadaratani
dhir dhir tillAna tillAna dhir dhir tillAna tAm


caraNam    mEragAdu rArA nAtO calamElarA cAlurA ninnu kOrina 
dAnarA nannElarA shrI krSNarAja maharAja chatrapati
takiTataka tarikiTa dhI....m taka tarikiTa taka dhI...m 
takiTataka tarikiTataka tA....m tA....m 
tA....m takadhimi takaNaka taka jhaNutaka tarikiTataka 
taddhillAnA takanadhiri taddhillAnA takanadhiri dhiri nAdhiri
